text: WWE 2K24 is a professional wrestling sports video game. It was published by 2K and was developed by Visual Concepts. It was released on March 8, 2024 for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S. It is the tenth game in the WWE 2K series. The game features returning match types that were in games before it such as the ambulance, casket, gauntlet, and special guest referee matches. There is a career mode called MyRise. There are paths for men called Undisputed and for women called Unleashed. On January 22, 2024, it was revealed that there were three different versions of the game that were going to be released. The regular game has Cody Rhodes as the cover athlete, the Deluxe edition has Rhea Ripley and Bianca Belair, and the 40 Years of WrestleMania edition where a collage of many different wrestlers in the company's history appear. ==Reception== The game was liked by game critics. Critics said that they liked the updated roster with less outdated gimmicks, returning match types and the inclusion of Super Finishers. However, critics didn't like some of the animations or the Showcase mode. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2024 video games Category:2K Sports games Category:Crossover video games Category:Multiplayer and single- player video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Professional wrestling video games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:WWE video games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: WWE 2K24
